评论详情: It’s the perfect blend of trendy and professional.  Here’s why I love it:  Chic Lace Detail: The lace accents on the neckline and sleeves add such an elegant touch. It’s feminine and classy without being over the top. Soft and Comfortable: The fabric is soft and breathable, making it comfortable to wear all day long. It has just the right amount of stretch for a flattering fit. Business Casual Perfection: This blouse is ideal for the office, paired with slacks or a skirt. But it’s just as great for casual outings with jeans or leggings. True to Size: The fit was exactly as expected based on the size chart, and it’s neither too tight nor too loose—just right! Easy to Care For: It’s held up beautifully after washing, with no shrinking or fading.

I love this shirt.  It’s comfortable and well made.  The fit was as expected, the fabric is a nice quality, it washes up beautifully with a hang dry (no iron needed). It can be dressed up or down depending on what you pair with it.  Slacks/skirt for the office or jeans for a nice casual outing. I bought it in 3 colors 🫣

I am 5'1" and about 200 pounds.  I am curvey and carry my weight well.  I like shirts to fit a little lose due to I do have a little mommy pouch.  This shirt is nice.  It's light weight, good for spring and early fall.  It's nice material.  The sleeves are cute and have room, which for me is great beacuse I do have large upper arms.  I would recommend the shirt.  For me, it's a little more clingy than I would had liked, but I will wear it.

These are lovely long sleeve shirts. I just love the puff sleeves and they have this design that's just wonderful on the sleeves, and you can see your skin through this because of the crochet. The colors are very nice, but not vibrant. The shirts are nice and affordable that I purchased several of them in several different colors. I just love these shirts, the V-neck is very flattering. The fit is true. The material of these shirts is nice it's not super soft, however, but it is comfortable and not scratchy. The sleeves are like a crochet and it's very flattering. I would say it's a go. Even though these shirts are not super warm for the winter, they are awesome when you don't want a very warm long sleeve shirt. They are a cool long sleeve shirt if there's such a thing. Like and let me know if you found this review helpful. Have a great shopping day.

I like the color and style of shirt. I hold most of my weight in my stomach area. I typically wear a large but this shirt is too snug in my stomach area. The arm length and the flowy sleeves are good. If I would have went up a size, I think the sleeves might look sloppy.

评论用户: I absolutely love these soft, comfy leggings. It’s almost like wearing nothing at all. The fleece isn’t real thick but is warm enough for West Virginia winters I think.
评论详情: I love this beautiful top! It’s comfortable and soft. True to size or maybe made a little big. It’s weird though I bought a black one in the same size and it was too small.
This shirt is so comfortable and stylish.  It’s great for those times when you think it may be warm or chilly.  Not too hot, not too cold.  Wonderfully made. Super comfortable.

True to size  but could have a little for stretch. Material can cling in colder weather ( static cling)  but not terrible . Comes in many colors . Love the v neck . It was surprisingly soft with the lace.

This shirt is great. The only downside and why I’m exchanging it is that this color, apricot, is slightly see-through. I’m exchanging for another  because aside from that, I really love this top. I am 5’11” and about 180 lbs right now, with most of my weight in my gut. I am also all torso. So take those characteristics into consideration when deciding if this shirt is right for you! It’s thin but feels very soft, even the lace sleeves aren’t scratchy or uncomfortable. I feel that this shirt was a good value for the price, I found many colors on sale for a couple bucks off. Tons of colors available also.

I got the shirt yesterday. It was a last ditch effort to finding something to wear out on vacation. I tried it on and was pleased. It is comfy and true to size and really cute. I went ahead and washed it. I put it in a lingerie bag so it would not get get snagged on other clothing. I then dried it on low heat. It came out just fine. I high recommend using the lingerie bag and low heat. I would not tumble it with other clothing that could catch on the sleeves. Over all pretty happy with it.
